Pre-Game Insights: In a pivotal match in Bengaluru, Match 41 of the ICC Men's ODI World Cup 2023 will pit New Zealand against Sri Lanka. With the Kiwis vying to advance to the top four and the Asian side already eliminated, this will be the final group stage match for both sides.

The BlackCaps lost their most recent match against Pakistan even though they scored 401 runs. While Kane Williamson struck an incredible 95 runs off 79 deliveries, Rachin Ravindra added another hundred runs.

In their most recent match, Sri Lanka played Bangladesh, and although it ended in a loss, there was a great deal of drama. Angelo Mathews was set for an uncommon 'timed out' ejection, while Sadeera Samarawickrama amassed 41 runs before being removed. Nevertheless, Sri Lanka amassed 279 runs thanks to a brilliant 108 runs by Charith Asalanka.
NZ vs SL Dream11 Prediction ICC ODI World Cup 2023, M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru, Pitch Report, and New Zealand vs Sri Lanka Dream11 Team.

In Bengaluru's last five games, the first innings score has averaged 320 runs. In this game, the hitters are probably going to have the upper hand and could score a high total. The side that wins the toss may decide to go straight to bat and establish dominance.
